languages.text: "В основном в Просторе присутствуют или флоты отдельных организаций, или небольшие флотилии торговых суден. Бесперебойное сообщение между мирами — вопрос жизни и смерти для многих отдаленных форпостов Человечества, поэтому даже в этом медвежьем углу действуют чартисты вроде нас и суда, приписанные к разнообразным Адептус. Увы, Коронус почти лишен стабильных торговых маршрутов, так что порой нам приходится несладко. Впрочем, кому как не Вольному Торговцу знать о трудностях местного товарооборота".

traits.locale_text: "В основном в Просторе присутствуют или флоты отдельных организаций, или небольшие флотилии торговых суден. Бесперебойное сообщение между мирами — вопрос жизни и смерти для многих отдаленных форпостов Человечества, поэтому даже в этом медвежьем углу действуют чартисты и суда, приписанные к разнообразным Адептус".

languages.text: "For the most part, all the Expanse has is fleets of different organisations and small flotillas of merchant ships. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "В основном в Просторе присутствуют или флоты отдельных организаций, или небольшие флотилии торговых суден. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「たいていの場合、エクスパンスには様々な組織の艦隊や商用船の小船団がある。惑星間の絶え間ない交易は、人類の多くの前哨地にとって死活問題なんだ。だからこんな帝国の暗い辺境にさえ、様々な部局に割り当てられたチャーティストや船団がいるってわけさ。だが悲しいかな、エクスパンスは安定した通商ルートとは程遠いところだから、時には危なっかしい仕事もあるけどな。とは言ったものの、自由開拓者ほど現地で商売をする苦労をよく知ってる者はいないわな」
languages.original_text: "For the most part, all the Expanse has is fleets of different organisations and small flotillas of merchant ships. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「たいていの場合、エクスパンスには様々な組織の艦隊や商用船の小船団がある。惑星間の絶え間ない交易は、人類の多くの前哨地にとって死活問題なんだ。だからこんな帝国の暗い辺境にさえ、様々な部局に割り当てられたチャーティストや船団がいるってわけさ。だが悲しいかな、エクスパンスは安定した通商ルートとは程遠いところだから、時には危なっかしい仕事もあるけどな。とは言ったものの、自由開拓者ほど現地で商売をする苦労をよく知ってる者はいないわな」

languages.text: « Les Étendues n'ont principalement que des flottes appartenant à différentes organisations et de petites flottilles de vaisseaux marchands. Pour survivre, la plupart des avant-postes de l'humanité doivent pouvoir communiquer de façon ininterrompue, ce qui veut dire que même dans ce sombre recoin de l'Imperium, vous trouverez des Cartographes et des vaisseaux affectés aux divers Adeptus. Malheureusement, les Étendues ont très peu de routes commerciales stables, ce qui veut dire que le travail est parfois assez précaire. Enfin, je ne connais personne de mieux placé qu'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} pour connaître les difficultés du commerce local. »
languages.original_text: "For the most part, all the Expanse has is fleets of different organisations and small flotillas of merchant ships. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Les Étendues n'ont principalement que des flottes appartenant à différentes organisations et de petites flottilles de vaisseaux marchands. Pour survivre, la plupart des avant-postes de l'humanité doivent pouvoir communiquer de façon ininterrompue, ce qui veut dire que même dans ce sombre recoin de l'Imperium, vous trouverez des Cartographes et des vaisseaux affectés aux divers Adeptus. Malheureusement, les Étendues ont très peu de routes commerciales stables, ce qui veut dire que le travail est parfois assez précaire. Enfin, je ne connais personne de mieux placé qu'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} pour connaître les difficultés du commerce local. »

languages.text: “科罗努斯扩区绝大部分区域都有大大小小的舰队，以及小型商船舰队。对人类帝国的诸多前哨站而言，必须与其他世界保持毫不间断的通讯，这是件生死攸关的大事。因此，哪怕是在这个黑暗的角落，也会有许许多多宪章船长与各自的舰队。遗憾的是，科罗努斯扩区几乎没有什么稳定的贸易航线，因此这份工作也会经常遇到危险。不过，恐怕没人比行商浪人更了解在这个地方做生意有多困难了。”
languages.original_text: "For the most part, all the Expanse has is fleets of different organisations and small flotillas of merchant ships. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “科罗努斯扩区绝大部分区域都有大大小小的舰队，以及小型商船舰队。对人类帝国的诸多前哨站而言，必须与其他世界保持毫不间断的通讯，这是件生死攸关的大事。因此，哪怕是在这个黑暗的角落，也会有许许多多宪章船长与各自的舰队。遗憾的是，科罗努斯扩区几乎没有什么稳定的贸易航线，因此这份工作也会经常遇到危险。不过，恐怕没人比行商浪人更了解在这个地方做生意有多困难了。”

languages.text: "Im Großen und Ganzen verfügt die Ausdehnung lediglich über die Flotten verschiedener Organisationen und kleine Flottillen von Handelsschiffen. Eine ununterbrochene Kommunikation ist für viele Außenposten der Menschheit eine Sache von Leben und Tod, und deswegen gibt es sogar in dieser dunklen Ecke des Imperiums Chartisten und Schiffe der diversen Adeptus. Leider hat die Ausdehnung praktisch keine festen Handelsrouten, was die Arbeit bisweilen recht gefährlich macht. Andererseits ist niemand vertrauter mit den Problemen des lokalen Handels als {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "For the most part, all the Expanse has is fleets of different organisations and small flotillas of merchant ships. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Im Großen und Ganzen verfügt die Ausdehnung lediglich über die Flotten verschiedener Organisationen und kleine Flottillen von Handelsschiffen. Eine ununterbrochene Kommunikation ist für viele Außenposten der Menschheit eine Sache von Leben und Tod, und deswegen gibt es sogar in dieser dunklen Ecke des Imperiums Chartisten und Schiffe der diversen Adeptus. Leider hat die Ausdehnung praktisch keine festen Handelsrouten, was die Arbeit bisweilen recht gefährlich macht. Andererseits ist niemand vertrauter mit den Problemen des lokalen Handels als {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: «En su mayor parte, la Extensión posee flotas de diferentes organizaciones y pequeñas flotillas de naves mercantes. Para garantizar la seguridad de gran parte de los puestos de la Humanidad, los mundos deben estar en constante comunicación. Por esta razón, incluso en esta región apartada del Imperium, se han asignado cartistas y naves a los diferentes Adeptos. Sin embargo, la Extensión casi no tiene rutas comerciales establecidas, así que el trabajo no siempre se puede realizar como es debido. De todas formas, nadie está más familiarizado con las dificultades del comercio local que un Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "For the most part, all the Expanse has is fleets of different organisations and small flotillas of merchant ships. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «En su mayor parte, la Extensión posee flotas de diferentes organizaciones y pequeñas flotillas de naves mercantes. Para garantizar la seguridad de gran parte de los puestos de la Humanidad, los mundos deben estar en constante comunicación. Por esta razón, incluso en esta región apartada del Imperium, se han asignado cartistas y naves a los diferentes Adeptos. Sin embargo, la Extensión casi no tiene rutas comerciales establecidas, así que el trabajo no siempre se puede realizar como es debido. De todas formas, nadie está más familiarizado con las dificultades del comercio local que un Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Ekseriyetle Enginlik, farklı kuruluşların oluşturduğu filolara ve tüccar gemilerinin kurulu küçük çaplı filotillalara sahiptir. İnsanlığın birçok karakolu için dünyalar arasında kesintisiz bir iletişime sahip olmak, ölümle kalım arasındaki ayrımı belirler. Dolayısıyla İmparatorluk'un bu karanlık köşesinde bile çeşitli Adeptuslara atanmış Haritacılar ve gemiler bulunur. Ne yazık ki Enginlik'te stabil ticaret yolları yok gibi bir şeydi. Bu yüzden işimiz bazen büyük riskler barındırabiliyor. Tabii yerel ticaretin zorlukları konusunda kimse bir Hür Tacir kadar bilgi sahibi olamaz."
languages.original_text: "For the most part, all the Expanse has is fleets of different organisations and small flotillas of merchant ships. Uninterrupted communication between worlds is a matter of life and death for many outposts of Humanity, so even in this dark corner of the Imperium, there are Chartists and ships assigned to the various Adeptus. Alas, the Expanse has next to no stable trade routes, so the job can be precarious at times. Then again, no one is more intimately familiar with the hardships of local commerce than a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Genel olarak Enginlik farklı kuruluşların oluşturduğu bir filoya ve tüccar gemilerinin oluşturduğu daha küçük çaplı filolara sahiptir. İnsanlığın sahip olduğu birçok koloni için dünyalar arasında kesintisiz bir iletişime sahip olmak ölüm kalım meselesidir, dolayısıyla İmparatorluk'un diyarının bu karanlık köşelerinde bile çeşitli Adeptus'a atanmış İmtiyazlılar ve gemiler bulunur. Ne yazık ki Enginlik'in stabil ticaret rotaları yok gibi bir şey, dolayısıyla işimiz bazen büyük riskler barındırabiliyor. Tabii yerel ticaretin zorlukları konusunda kimse bir Hür Tacir kadar yakından bilgi sahibi değildir."
